participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.background: I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love. I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game. I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love. I am constantly drinking. I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.

participant_2.name: Kyle
participant_2.background: I'm single and I need my space. I like to make my own Christmas cards. My favorite song is Barbie Girl. I'm known for my moves on the dance floor. I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing great! I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant and I'm also dating my new love.
That's awesome! I'm single and I need my space, but I'm happy for you.
What do you do for work?
I'm a designer and I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.
That's awesome! I love making my own Christmas cards.
That's so cool! I'm not very crafty, but I admire people who are.
Thanks! I'm known for my moves on the dance floor.
That's really impressive! I'm not much of a dancer, but I love to watch people who are.
I once had to eat an entire plate of broccoli.
Me too! I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.
That's hilarious! I'm glad we can relate.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who is so similar to me.
You too! I hope we can chat again soon.
